text: nī atbhutappeṭunnuveṅkil avaruṭe ī vākkatre atbhutakaramāyiṭṭuḷḷat‌. ñaṅṅaḷ maṇṇāyikkaḻiññiṭṭēā? ñaṅṅaḷ pututāyi sr̥ṣṭikkappeṭuka tanne ceyyumēā? akkūṭṭarāṇ taṅṅaḷuṭe rakṣitāvil aviśvasiccavar. akkūṭṭarāṇ kaḻuttukaḷil vilaṅṅukaḷuḷḷavar. akkuṭṭarāṇ narakāvakāśikaḷ. avaratil nityavāsikaḷāyirikkuṁ
